nodehandler.name: READ ME FIRST!!
nodehandler.text:
=======================================
+++To GMs+++: Send a copy of the Player's Initiative Tool node to each of your players by right-clicking and pressing "Send to Player". Advise them to open "READ ME FIRST". Feel free to delete the node afterwards.
This node should help speed things up a bit for the players, and hopefully end the nagging "how do I roll my init again?" questions.
=======================================
+++To Players+++: The Player's Initiative Tool provides you a list of macros for the Initiative Tool v2, usable by anyone (not just the GM). What to do:
1) Right-click and press "design" on each of the macro nodes. --- The title describes what the macro will do. --- The comment text (between the "<!---" and "--->") describes how you should type it out in the chat or macro window. If you have trouble understanding, read the comment out loud to yourself. --- The last line shows an example of the macro.
2) Replace the examples with your character's information. --- Feel free to delete any comments or macros that you definitely won't use. --- "Show Inits" and "Next Turn" don't need to be changed at all.
3) Double-click the macro to activate it. --- If you need to make changes later on, just right-click and "design" again to change the macro. --- For effects in particular, sometimes it's easier just to memorize the formula rather than change it every time you want to add something.

nodehandler.name: Next Turn
nodehandler.text: <!---Advances the initiative to the next turn; use only at end of your turn and not other people's turns---> nextinit

nodehandler.name: Show Inits
nodehandler.text: <!---Shows a public list of initiatives; can be quite spammy---> showinits

nodehandler.name: Roll Init (D20)
nodehandler.text: <!---Name, space Initiative Roll in brackets, space the word "init"---> Veggiesama [1d20+2] init

nodehandler.name: Add Effect (D20)
nodehandler.text: <!---Name, space Initiative Count of caster/user in brackets, space the word "effect", space the Duration (in rounds) of the effect---> <!---Detailing the exact effects in the Name, though spammy, can be useful for yourself and the GM---> Veggiesama's Awesome Aura (+4 STR/DEX/CON to all in 20' radius, +8 to self) [10] effect 5

nodehandler.name: Roll Init (SR4)
nodehandler.text: <!---Name, space Initiative Roll in brackets, space the word "init", space Initiative Passes---> <!---the Initiative Roll is [Xd6.init(Y)], where X is the number of dice you are rolling, and Y is your Initiative Score (usually both the same value)---> Veggiesama [5d6.init(5)] init 2
